title: Aston Martin F1 staff must stick to the truth or Newey will catch them out, says Alonso
summary: Adrian Newey joined Aston Martin at a race weekend for the first time in Monaco, and it was clear to see how the team upped its game as a result, said Fernando Alonso

qa_pairs.question: Who is the Chief Technical Officer known for his significant contributions to multiple F1 teams, including Red Bull Racing?
Which driver emphasized the importance of honesty within the Aston Martin team during a recent race weekend?
At which race weekend did Adrian Newey make his first appearance with Aston Martin?
